original_title: The Married Woman Whose Husband’s Boss Adorns Her With Body Accessories
overview: "You look better on this one than on plain clothes. My wife, Maki, who was called by her husband's boss, Sugiura, was asked to try on body accessories created as a new business of the company. As it was said, Maki, who wore it from the top of her clothes, gave off a bewitching light. A few days later, Sugiura's words refrained ... Suddenly, Maki, standing alone in front of the mirror stand, was ashamed to be naked and wore body accessories. At that moment, I woke up to the joy of being a woman I had forgotten ...
title: The Married Woman Whose Husband’s Boss Adorns Her With Body Accessories
